title: Rules for Priests
summary: Leviticus 21 gives special instructions for priests regarding purity and holiness. They are held to higher standards, especially the high priest, in order to honor God's holiness in their service.

faq.question: Why were priests held to stricter standards?
faq.answer: Because they represented the people before God and served in His holy presence.

faq.question: Could priests with physical defects serve?
faq.answer: They could eat holy food but could not offer sacrifices at the altar.
